Description:
Responsible to produce visual communication (text and imagery concept) for the Company.Manage digital and print-out design for marketing activities and ensure high-quality graphics content based on SOPs and brand guidelines. Below are the essential duties and responsibilities but are not limited to:Brainstorm and work closely with Marketing and Commercial team for the concept and ideas.
Prepare creative content for the brands online campaigns, videos, print ads, brand labels, logos by combining brand standards, color theories, typography, and graphic elements to make visuals compelling and attention-seeking.
Design graphics to meet specific promotional and commercial needs like logos, packaging, displays, or imagery for digital and printable products.
Decide how images and text work to fit a specific layout and size.
Create infographics that make complex ideas simpler and more accessible.
Develop the production design and overall layout for advertisements, magazines, banners, products, brochures, etc. 
Propose and communicate concepts and designs to Marketing team prior to incorporating them into revised designs.
Amend designs based on brand feedback and obtain Line Manager approval.
Check samples and materials quality from the Procurement team as per the brand guidelines.
Proofread final graphic designs for typos and errors before submission, distribution, and execution.
Upskill to keep up to date with the latest tools and technologies in graphics designing.
Act as a point of contact with the Suppliers, third-party vendors and agencies for designing, packaging etc.
Perform other tasks assigned by Line Manager as and when required.Skills
Skills:
Proven work experience as a graphic designer.
Portfolio with design projects.
Fluency in verbal communication & writing skills (Arabic and English).
Thorough understanding of marketing, website design, production, corporate identity, advertisements, product packaging, and multimedia design.
Proficiency in tools such as Photoshop, Adobe, InDesign, and Illustrator.
Aesthetic, creative, and analytical skills.
Ability to give and receive constructive criticism.
Understanding of quality of material, dimensions & packaging etc.
Ability to work on tight deadlines. 
Attention to detail and ability to multitask.
Energetic and self-starter.
Flexible & Passionate.

Preferred.Nationality: All Arab Countries; All GCC Countries

Data.Company Industry: Food & Beverage Production; Catering, Food Service, & Restaurant; Marketing
